meanings.definition: A system of esoteric theosophy and theurgy developed by rabbis, reaching its peak about the 12th and 13th centuries, and influencing certain medieval and Renaissance Christian thinkers.
meanings.sent1: Studying qabalahs helps us understand ancient beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The scholars delved deep into the mysteries of qabalahs.
meanings.sent3: Some believe that mastering qabalahs gives magical powers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a labyrinth of qabalahs, full of hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The library contained ancient scrolls on qabalahs.

meanings.definition: A secret or esoteric doctrine or science.
meanings.sent1: The group shared a fascination with mysterious qabalahs.
meanings.sent2: Many seek to unravel the secrets of qabalahs.
meanings.sent3: His interest in qabalahs made him seem enigmatic.
meanings.sent4: The book revealed the hidden truths of qabalahs.
meanings.sent5: She whispered ancient chants related to qabalahs.
